entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
